Overview

Augmented reality gives us the ability to overlay virtual data on top of the real world. Previously, augmented reality was limited to military technologies like heads up displays and television broadcasts such as sports overlays; Now with advances in smartphone technologies, augmented reality is working its way into our every day lives. While mobile augmented reality is in the spotlight from Pok√©mon Go and Snapchat filters, industrial applications are changing the way we work and interface with technology.
